name: Casi-NOPE
description:
Sadly, due to last minute upload fixes, the windows downloadable build was deleted and the WebGL build does not work. please find the game (That is downloadable) through this link: https://ssibai.itch.io/casinopegmtk 

No changes were made to the build, give us a chance and we appreciate your feedback and comments :D 

WASD for movement.

Pick dice to reset bullets & health. Both machines should be filled before new dice spawn. 

Collect as much moneh as you can.

Casino gone crazy.
